definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Previously also speak Mandarin, Sichuan, guests hear the words, but also with soil any more.
sentences.chinese: 先前还讲普通话，听到客人是四川话，也用土话了。

sentences.english: An American who has been short-changed would complain in the vernacular of being "stiffed".
sentences.chinese: 在美国土话中，常把被人愚弄形容成“僵化了。

sentences.english: The second part is about the comprehensive comparison of the consonants of Tuhua.
sentences.chinese: 第二节永州土话声母综合比较。

sentences.english: These writers, by representing dialects in their novels, bravely violated the boundaries between dialects and standard English as socio linguists prescribed.
sentences.chinese: 这些作家以极大的勇气去表现为舆论所鄙夷的土话。

sentences.english: From the third to fifth part, is to study Changshan dialect's morphology.
sentences.chinese: 第三至五部分是崇山土话的词法研究。

sentences.english: Religious works were converted from Latin into the vernacular.
sentences.chinese: 宗教作品从拉丁文被转化成当地的土话。

sentences.english: Forinstance, use southern jargon for someone living in the south.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，让来自南方的人说南方土话。

sentences.english: Jiahe Tuhua used in this area has huge internal differences.
sentences.chinese: 湖南嘉禾县属于湘南双方言区，其土话内部差异较大。

sentences.english: They like his slang and his brag and his blunders.
sentences.chinese: 他们很喜欢听他说土话，吹牛皮或胡说八道。

sentences.english: Jiahe County is a bi-dialectal area in south Hunan Province. Jiahe Tuhua used in this area has huge internal differences.
sentences.chinese: 湖南嘉禾县属于湘南双方言区，其土话内部差异较大。

definition: the first Chinese dialect dictionary, edited by Yang Xiong 揚雄|扬雄[Yang2 Xiong2] in 1st century, containing over 9000 characters
Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
pet phrase/regularly used expression/manner of speaking
popular piece of doggerel/common phrase repeated as a jingle
Qihai dialect, a Wu dialect spoken in Tongzhou, Haimen, and Qidong districts in southern Jiangsu province, and on Chongming Island in Shanghai
